title.rendered: Digiperform is the perfect place to start a career in Digital Marketing. – Sohail Sayed

content.rendered:
If a person decides to live a highly satisfying work life, one needs to choose the right career option. But sometimes, we realize only after the trial and error method. Unfortunately, there are many people who end up making the wrong career choice and realize only after working in that environment.  Something of this sort happened with Sohail Sayed who was blinkered in his view of the world of work. But he made a voluntary choice of switching his career from Engineering to Digital Marketing with the help of a Digital Marketing Course in Bangalore. Readout his story in his own words!

It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

My name is Sohail Sayed and I am an Engineering graduate. I have completed my Digital Marketing Course from Digiperform Bangalore- BTM centre. 

What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

As mentioned I come from an Engineering background where I did not enjoy the work. I was learning coding and other technical things and that’s the reason I made a shift. I had an idea of Digital Marketing and was interested in it. 

Tell us about your favourite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

The teaching part was really good. Our trainer Veerendra was very supportive and it was always exciting to attend the classes.

Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Yes, because I was delivered whatever I was promised at the beginning

If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

I would give Digiperform, 8/10

Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

I see myself as a successful Digital Marketing Manager.

If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

I would rather suggest them to enrol in Digiperform because that’s where they get to know the modern world work requirements. 

Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

A decent place to start a career in Digital Marketing.
